content:
You've got a great collection of travel photos! Let's create a similar folder structure for each of these destinations. Here's a suggested organization scheme:

* Hawaii
	+ Island of Oahu
		- Waikiki Beach
		- Pearl Harbor
		- Hanauma Bay Snorkeling
	+ Island of Maui
		- Road to Hana
		- Haleakala National Park
		- Lahaina Town
	+ Island of Kauai
		- Na Pali Coast
		- Wailua River State Park
		- Poipu Beach
* Yosemite
	+ Day 1
		- Yosemite Valley
		- Half Dome
		- Waterfalls
	+ Day 2
		- Glacier Point
		- Tuolumne Meadows
		- Hiking to [trail name]
* San Francisco
	+ Landmarks
		- Golden Gate Bridge
		- Alcatraz Island
		- Lombard Street
	+ Neighborhoods
		- Fisherman's Wharf
		- Haight-Ashbury
		- Chinatown
* Disney World
	+ Magic Kingdom
		- Cinderella's Castle
		- Space Mountain
		- Character Meet-and-Greets
	+ Epcot
		- World Showcase
		- Soarin'
		- Illuminations
	+ Hollywood Studios
		- Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge
		- Tower of Terror
		- Fantasmic!

Feel free to adjust these folders and subfolders to fit your specific trips and memories. You can also add more subfolders or categories as needed. For example, you might want to create separate folders for each Disney World park, or add a "Food" folder for all the delicious meals you had on your trips.

Remember to also consider adding tags or keywords to your photos, so you can easily search for specific images across multiple folders. This way, if you want to find all your photos of sunsets or food, you can quickly search for those keywords.
